features: 👑【Premium Material】Made of high-quality upgraded microfiber polycotton, this type of material will recover it's fluffy shape. Pat the pillow inserts with your hands until it gets fully expanded to make inserts fluffy again. The polycotton will lose elasticity temporarily through long time vacuum compression. These sofa throw pillow inserts are comfortable, skin-friendly, and breathable. And being well stitched, these square pillows are durable and sturdy for long-time use.

👑【Ultra-Soft & Super Plump】Dreaming of having a relaxing leisure time? It’s time to get these decorative pillow inserts! Each couch pillow is filled with 440g of top-quality polycotton, ensuring excellent softness and fullness, providing the perfect support for your head and waist.

👑【Versatile Usage】These polycotton throw pillow inserts sets are suitable for various occasions such as sofa, couch, living room, bedroom, office, club, restaurant, and so on. It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family on Christmas, Thanksgiving, Halloween,Fall , etc.

👑【Easy to Clean & Storage】Hand washable, please dry at a low temperature and hang flat. You can stack them in the closet, or compress them together, and they will regain the elasticity when being used again. Definitely a must-have for you to decorate your home!

👑【What Can You Get】The package comes with 4 packs of pillow inserts. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these square bed pillows and provide a 30-day money-back warranty for all people. And all questions and suggestions will be responded to within 24 hours.
body.description: BRAND STORY:Looking for something affordable and practical that can not only provide maximum comfort but also be a great decoration for your house? Well, we are glad that you finally find us! MENGT is a professional pillow maker and we pay all attention to creating practical and comfortable pillows for all people. With premium material and superior craftsmanship, you can never go wrong with MENGT!Feature:1. Made of high-quality polycotton and brushed fabric, these square couch pillows inserts are durable, comfortable, and will not irritate your skin while using.2. Ultra-soft and super plump for daily use.3. Simple design, this hypoallergenic pillow insert can match almost all kinds of home decor styles.4. Easy to clean and store.5. A decent housewarming gift for your friends or family.Specification:1. Material: Brushed Fabric + Polycotton2. Dimension: 18 x 18 Inches3. Color: White4. Filling Weight: 440g5. Net Weight: 455g6. Package Information: 4 x White Pillow InsertsPlease Note:① The color may slightly differ from the picture mainly due to different lights and monitors, please kindly understand.② The size is measured manually and may exist a 1-2mm error.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the MENGT Throw Pillow Inserts in the 18" x 18" size, and the set of 4 has proven to be a fantastic addition to my home.Firstly, the pillows are wonderfully plush and ultra-soft. The polycotton filling strikes a perfect balance, providing a comfortable and supportive feel. They are ideal for both decorative use on the sofa and for adding extra comfort to the bed.The hypoallergenic feature is a definite plus, ensuring a worry-free experience for those with sensitivities. The white color of the inserts is versatile, effortlessly blending with various decor styles. It's a clean and classic choice that complements any throw pillow cover or case.The 18" x 18" size is just right – not too bulky, yet substantial enough to make a visual impact. The pillows maintain their shape well, and the stitching is sturdy, indicating good overall quality.What I appreciate most is the set of four, providing a cost-effective solution for multiple pillows. Whether it's for decorating different areas of the home or creating a cohesive look on the sofa, having a set of four is convenient.In terms of value, the MENGT Throw Pillow Inserts offer a great deal for the price. They are a simple yet effective way to update and refresh the look and feel of any space. If you're in need of comfortable, hypoallergenic throw pillow inserts in a versatile size, this set is a reliable choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pillow Covers
reviews.reviewText: These pillow inserts are the cats meow! After reading the reviews I ordered the size of the pillow covers 18x18. Amazed when the pillows arrived they were flatter than a pancake! Well, I thought, this is never going work. I fluffed and they looked pretty good, put them in the pillow covers and the next day they were perfect! Covers well filled! Karate chop if you wish. They are soft and met more than my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy Pillow Inserts
reviews.reviewText: These inserts are great! They come packaged very secured and vacuum-sealed. The inserts themselves do not have a zipper to add more filling, but I put them in the dryer on low for 30 minutes after opening and they fluffed up very nicely. They aren’t the fullest pillow inserts I’ve seen/ owned, but they are good quality, not too flat, and fill out an 18x18 pillow case perfectly after fluffing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not too fluffy.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good quality product, but it’s not that fluffy. Could use more cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffed up big!
reviews.reviewText: Boy was I surprised by the size of these....they were very flat (compressed) when I got them...I took them out and fluffed them some and put them in dryer per the directions. They fluffed up very nicely. I got 20x20 pillows go in 18x18 cases so they would be extra fluffy. These fluffed up so big I barely got them in the cases! Never had that issue in the past. Definitely recommend these but get the correct size instead of sizing up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These pillow forms are perfect for my 18x18” pillow covers
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure what people are talking about when they say these 18 x18” pillow forms, are not full enough for an 18x18” pillow cover. After I took them out of the packaging, I used my hands to pull the fiber fill apart, and put the pillows in the dryer with dryer balls and a damp dish towel. I set it on low heat and it ran for 33 minutes. When I took them out of the dryer, they were the perfect size and fullness for my 18x18” pillow covers. It took a little work to get them stuffed evenly distributed within the cover, but now they look fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pillow Inserts
reviews.reviewText: These pillow inserts are great! They are not too soft and not too hard. It was easy to use them with my new pillow covers. The packing was also impressive as the pillows took up very little space. The value is also excellent, and I highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024

reviews.reviewText: No son tan aguadas ,quedan perfectas para los cojines solo que no se si al lavarlas sigan igual tienen relleno medio .
